page.title: 09DITTON PRIORS VILLAGE HALL.
page.content: The building was constructed in 1942 as a{canteen}for the Depot workers.In 1970 it became a Village Hall. The Hall consists of a stage,hall, kitchen,bar,toilets,storage area, committee room and cloakroom.Its licenced to hold 200 people.It also has a large car park which the mobile health clinic uses.It is constructed of prefabricated concrete.Funds are now being raised for a new roof on the storage area. { USERS OF THE VILLAGE HALL Playgroup. : : : Mon. Wed. Fri. Keep fit. : : : Once a week. Brownies. : : : Once a week. Youth Club.: : : Once a week,winter W.I. : : : Once a month. Gang Show. : : : 2 per year. Discos and Dances. : : :12 per year. The Hall is used by the {Bridgnorth {Walk}for refreshments and first aid.
